about_the_game:
You wake up in this new world. There are four zones to explore. Each zone has its own hidden devices within them.
As you explore, you can develop a stronger soul by fighting others. Once beating them, you can choose to let them go free or take their secret, making you vastly stronger.

Discover what happened and who is chasing after you. There will be some hints given in unordinary means, but you will understand.
Depending on your actions and beliefs, you can change everything.

Features


  • Journey through a new world with its new, beautiful, and mysterious locations!
  • Enjoy a beautiful story and (hopefully) nice soundtrack!
  • Have a party where you the player lead Mash with some of his allies.
  • Other fantastic gameplay mechanics that make the game fun.
  • Make choices that maybe affect the story?
  • Level and Currency systems.
  • A moderately challenging game, that gets harder as it goes on! (definition of a normal game, to be honest)
  • Some Easter Eggs (Secrets) hidden inside and/or outside the game!
  • And taking a lot of Secrets!

[Warning: This game contains flashing lights, patterns, and images; some people may experience seizures when exposed to such. Please be careful.]
[Another Warning: This game is not a horror game, but parts of the game may cause paranoia and fear to you.]

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)


  • What's a secret?
    In the game there is a power system. Your strength is correlated to how strong your soul is. Your soul becomes stronger through bonds and acquiring info about other people. Similar to Persona with the arcana. When you beat someone in a fight, one's soul can no longer fight back and you have the option of essentially forcing them to give away a general secret that they wouldn't want known. If you choose to take their secret, you become vastly more powerful. But if you choose to not take it, there are other benefits to be seen.
  • What is the significance of the characters' outfits?
    One's outfit is based on their personality. This also applies to their powers too.
  • Who is Mash?
    He is the titular character of the game. Although the game is similar to an RPG, it isn't 100% an RPG because you are stuck as playing Mash, who has his own character. Although, Mash's true character is not entirely explored nor does he speak much. Thus, you can put your own spin on the character.
  • In zone two, there is a locked gate. What is the passcode?
    check the room order. Heart, Ace, Spade, Clover. Make this of what you will.
  • How long is the game?
    The game is fairly short. A standard playthrough will be 1-3 hours long. However, with there being a lot of various hidden events in the game, you will not see everything the game has to offer in one playthrough! So most will probably play the game again until they find mostly everything.
    The demo is around 20 minutes.

Wishlist

Go Wishlist Secrets For Taking now! You'll be notified of when the Game is available!
And thank you to everyone who has already wishlisted the game. You have my deepest respect and gratitude!

Still here?
